txt.en: Deliver the wood scraps to the lumber pile
A lumber pile can be found in Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should deliver the wood scraps to the lumber pile.
Nessa Larch can be found in Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should talk to Nessa Larch.
That should help with the reconstruction efforts!
'Indeed, Trestlebridge looks much better now that all those scraps of wood and clutter have been picked up. I thank you for your efforts in assisting the Brotherhood, [placeholder].'

'The repairs are coming along in Trestlebridge. I fear that we may be making more of a mess than revitalizing the village. Have you seen all of the wood and boards strewn about?!\n\n'I ask of you to clear up some of this mess. You can add the wood scraps to the lumber pile in town after you have picked them all up. That would most helpful.'
Constant attacks have left Trestlebridge in disrepair, and the Woodcutter's Brotherhood is doing everything they can to restore the village.
Wood scraps can be found throughout Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should help out and pick up the wood scraps.
